nodes.text: The Ulkantha asteroids were a group of asteroids. During the Galactic Civil War, the asteroids hosted the base of operations for smugglers. When Darth Vader's personal fleet of Imperial Star Destroyers, known as Death Squadron, raided the asteroids shortly before the Battle of Hoth, they uncovered evidence of a smuggling ring made up of members of the Sakiyan species, with its headquarters in Syvris shadowport near Hutt Space.
